title: Intelligent Tutoring System Design and Application for Students with Learning Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding learning disabilities, basic instructional design principles, and experience with online education platforms
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service and in-service teachers to develop competencies in designing intelligent tutoring systems for supporting students with learning disabilities.

learning_goals: One can explain the principles of designing single-mode instructional methods to reduce cognitive load for students with learning disabilities
One can propose strategies to consider the emotional responses of students with learning disabilities when designing interfaces for intelligent tutoring systems
One can interpret SVM-based learning effectiveness analysis results and apply them to improve instructional strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
